metadata.name: mini maw
metadata.description:
[i]"Sucking buddy"[/i]
Adds a new familiar to the Devil and Treasure Room pools!
Mini Maw follows Isaac, sucking enemy projectiles within a certain range. Fires a normal tear towards the closest enemy when hit by an enemy projectile.
Synergizes with BFFS: fires triple shot tears.
This item is part of the StrawPack item pack.
Code and sprites by Strawrat.
